name: Weird Input vs Asteroids vs Space Invaders
name_original: Weird Input vs Asteroids vs Space Invaders
description:
Weird Input vs Asteroids vs Space Invaders is a shooter game developed by pipwolverine. It came out on 08-02-2022.
You can play Weird Input vs Asteroids vs Space Invaders on PC. You can purchase the game on itch.io.
